sub_topic: Identifying the isomorphism between two graphs.
message_1:
Identify whether the graphs shown below are isomorphic or not:

Graph 1:

```
1 -- 2
|    |
3 -- 4
```

Graph 2:

```
A -- B
|    |
C -- D
```
message_2:
The graphs are isomorphic.

An isomorphism between the two graphs can be established by mapping the vertices of Graph 1 to the vertices of Graph 2 as follows:

1 -> A
2 -> B
3 -> C
4 -> D

The edges in both graphs are the same when considering this mapping, so the graphs are isomorphic.
